#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,max,tie,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        max = 0;
        i = 0;
        int w[50] = {0};
        while(i < n)
            cin>>w[i++];
        i = 0;
        while(i<n)
        {
            cin>>tie;
            if(max<(w[i] * 3 + tie))
                max = w[i] * 3 + tie;
            i++;
        }
        cout<<max<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
